text.jpText:
開催を楽しみにする声も増え、
徐々に盛り上がって来たURAファイナルズ。
text.enText:
The URA Finals is gradually gaining 
momentum as more and more people 
look forward to the event.

text.jpText:
<chrname>の人気はいまひとつで、
ますます努力せねばならないが――
text.enText:
<chrname> is not as popular as it should be, 
and we will have to work on it more and more…

text.jpText:
<chrname>も順調にファンを増やし
“スターウマ娘”へと近づいており――
text.enText:
<chrname> is steadily increasing 
her fan base and moving closer to 
becoming a "Star Uma Musume".

text.jpText:
<chrname>も圧倒的な魅力で
人々の心を引き付けており――
text.enText:
<chrname> also has an overwhelming charm that 
attracts people's hearts and minds.

text.jpText:
先日大きく成長した桐生院トレーナーと
ハッピーミークも加え、レース開催に向け
気合いを入れ直したのだった。
text.enText:
The trainer of Kiryuin and Happy Meek, who 
had recently grown up a lot, were also added 
to the team. They were fired up for the race.
